fortification.help.name: Fortifications
fortification.help.description: Some Enemies have natural Fortifications. Others gain Fortifications when they occupy a Fortified Location that you Assault. Fortifications prevent usage of non-siege Attacks. Fortifications stack so double-Fortifications prevent any kind of range or siege attacks on the Enemy. If you group Fortified and non-Fortified enemies during battle the non-fortified enemies will also gain Fortifications.
fortification.double_fortified.descripti: Enemies that are Double Fortified are typically protected by their own fortification also within the fortified walls of the battle location and cannot be targeted by any kind of attack in the Range Attack phase. You will need to wait for the Attack Phase where they come out in the open to target them. When grouped with non-fortified enemies they will share their Fortification with the non-fortified enemies which will become Fortified and already Fortified enemies will become Double Fortified.
fortification.double_fortified.name: Double Fortified
fortification.fortified.description: Fortified sites, increases the fortification of all the Enemies within it. Enemies that are Fortified are protected by the fortifications of the battle location (or their own Fortification) and can only be targeted by Siege Attacks in the Range Attack phase. When grouped with non-fortified enemies they will share their Fortification with the non-fortified enemies.
fortification.fortified.name: Fortified
fortification.never_fortified.descriptio: Enemies that are Never fortified alwas ignore any kind of fortification that are provided by the environment or battle arena or when grouped with other enemies. They typically always attack in the open and thus can be targeted by any kind of Range attack in the Range Attack phase.
fortification.never_fortified.name: Never Fortified
fortification.not_fortified.description: Enemies that are Not fortified are not protected by the fortification of the battle location and thus can be targeted by any kind of Range attack in the Range Attack phase. Not Fortified enemies grouped with Fortified enemies will benefit from the fortification brought by the other enemies in the group and become Fortified themselves.
fortification.not_fortified.name: Not Fortified
